casebody.data:
UMBERGER
v.
PIKE CORPORATION, et al. No. 37PA16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 8, 2016. Scott M. Tyler, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. Glenn E. Ketner, III, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al. Paul R. Dickinson, Jr., Charlotte, for Lieberg, Collin. Marc Ackerman, for Lieberg, Collin. Richard A. Maniskas, for Lieberg, Collin. Kurt F. Hausier, for Beickert, Edwin. Brian D. Long, for Beickert, Edwin. J. Daniel Albert, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2016 by Defendant (Pike Corporation) to Consolidate Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of February 2016."
